name: CITY OF ABILENE, TX
sampleDescriptions: Support the B-1B and B-21 Bomber program and support for the overall mission of Dyess AFB.
Discussed transportation issues near the airport and enhancing the airport terminal.
Support the retention of the B-1B. Support the PB for the B-21B. Address any MILCON needs for the future basing of the B-21B.
